Row.Text: Very well.
All right.
Certainly.
It is agreed.
Oh, very well.
I suppose I must.
Excellent.
Vulgar barbarian! Your end will come swiftly and righteously!
Insolent snake! You offend both the heaven and the earth!
The gods weep at your foolishness. Pray that I have a fraction of their pity.
Clearly your education is lacking. Let me teach you the Mudruvese art of warfare.
Your barbaric ways distort the very essence of this world. I will do all mankind a favor.
I will pray for the gods to take mercy upon your sins, for you shall be meeting them soon.
It is heaven's order that you are next to fall in line.
in the next world
Your deviance has angered the heavens. Pay your dues now, or we can no longer shield you from divine retribution!
The gods, in their benevolence, smile at the idea of a token of goodwill for our two great nations.
A modest tribute is requested to maintain the delicate balance of our relations. Our fates are intertwined, after all.
I must refuse.
I must say no.
Unfortunately I must decline.
I advise a different path.
It can't be done.
It is not the right time.
You must teach me your foreign humor next time!
Sorry, I must have misheard you.
Greetings, stranger. I am the Emperor Hmindun, hegemon and uniter of Mitruhmoer. May future generations study our meeting in the annals of history.
You stand before the Emperor Hmindun, inheritor of Holy Mother Shidrang's legacy. May divine wisdom guide you as it has guided my dominion.
Hail, traveler. I am Hmindun, Emperor of Mitruhmoer. Heaven and earth align in our presence. Speak resolutely, for the gods bear witness.
Farewell.
Goodbye.
Until we meet again.
Go away now.
That is all.
Welcome.
Hello.
Greetings.
Good day.
Oh, it's you.
Well?
What do you want?
Speak your words and I shall hear it.
Go ahead.
Proceed.
I'm listening.
Yes?
You were saying?
And?
Go on.
Our setback is not due to divine displeasure but the shortcomings of those who failed to execute my strategies. Heads will roll for this disgrace.
Our defeat is a bitter pill to swallow, but the heavens still watch. This will not be forgotten.
The divine balance is delicate, easily disturbed by the careless. The duty of the ruler is to maintain the order bestowed by the gods.
The heavens favor those who honor the past, navigate the present, and guide the future. Let rulers be the architects of earthly destiny.
Your proposal is pitiful. Improve your offer.
Do not waste my time with your little jokes.
You must do better than that.
Almostâ€¦
We appreciate your candor, but it falls somewhat short.
I hope this is not a sign of difficulties in your nation. Let us find a mutually beneficial arrangement.
Would you consider a more substantial offer?
It is not quite enough, but please, one more offer.
Your offer borders on the insulting. I suggest that you improve it or withdraw it.
Can you do a little better?
It is close but not enough.
That's not good enough.
Did you come to my court merely to insult me? Fools play foolish games.
Unfortunately we must decline your kind offer.
It is unsuitable for Mitruhmoer. Perhaps another season.
Then let it be so.
Excellent. It is agreed.
Very well.
Consider this offer a display of my generosity and charity. Your acceptance is expected.
In recognition of our good relations, I extend this trade offer. May it bring prosperity to us both.
I extend to you this trade offer from the nation of Mitruhmoer. Let us mutually benefit in this exchange.
Pathetic toad! We do not yield to such demands. Expect no tribute!
Woefully I must decline. May we both prosper through other means.
I must decline. Let our dealings be fair and just.
It seems we can not refuse, but know that this does not imply submission.
If your people have such need for this, then they shall have it! A small sacrifice to strengthen the bond between us.
Very well. Enjoy it while you are able.
No problem. We shall come and take it when we're ready.
How disappointing.
How very disappointing.
Indeed? I admire your foolish bravery.
How foolish of you.
Fool! You will live to regret this, I promise you!
It was disappointing but amusing to see your men fall so easily, but we should both rest. Don't start your foolishness again.
You should feel most fortunate that we did not find it worthwhile to continue this farce. My condolences to your fallen.
